diagnostics.message: Variable 'rules_dir' uses snake_case; ambient convention is camelCase (e.g., rulesDir in rules.ts, changedFiles, useLocalBranchDiff).
debugLog is duplicated in main.ts and backend.ts with identical implementation; violates DRY and module-boundary patterns used elsewhere (e.g., shared spawn/stdio in backend, shared path usage).
rules.map() used for side effects only; ambient pattern uses map for transformation (e.g., rules.map(r => r.id)) and forEach/for-of for iteration. Prefer rules.forEach() or for...of.
console.log used for output; ambient pattern uses process.stderr.write for debug and process.stdout.write for structured output (reporter, formatJsonOutput).
